title: DLC Boot 2016 v3.1 Build 160415 Final [SadeemPC].zip
description:
DLC Boot 2016 is a rescue disk that is used as a Recovery CD. The point is that if you are having problems such as Windows can not boot, missing MBR, want to format the hard drive, remove viruses and so on, you can simply use the DLC Boot 2016 to resolve the issue. DLC Boot 2016 is also able to backup / restore windows partition, create partition windows, entering a locked Windows passwords, and much more!

DLC Boot 2016 has the same function with Hiren's Boot DVD. However, the DLC Ultimate Boot 2016 more gress / new / latest compared Hiren's Boot who was too old school.

Supporting applications that exist within the DLC Boot in 2016 alone quite a lot and more complete than Hiren's Boot CD, which you can see here.

Details DLC Boot 3.1 Build 160415

* Integrated Mini Windows 10 32Bit, 64Bit Windows 10 because their Mini editing (Editing, Music, Movies, USB 3.0, USB 3G, UEFI), was built environment similar to Windows XP Mini Hiren's Version

* Integrated Mini Windows XP deducted from Hiren's Version 15.2 and has been built, optimized again.

Read More About Included Tools Here 
http://www.sadeempc.com/dlc-boot-2016/


How to Use the DLC Boot in 2016 there are two ways:
1. To create an ISO file, extract the RAR file with WinRAR DLC Boot 2016.
2. Run DLCBoot.exe file and then click on the DVD icon right corner [Create ISO] and wait for it to finish.
3. Done! ISO files can burning into DVD-R

Or if you choose to use via FD 4 GB, use this procedure:
Make sure the flash drive in the empty and no data in it!
1. Extract the RAR file with WinRAR DLC Boot 2016.
2. Run DLCBoot.exe file and then click on the right corner of the Create USB HDD Box Boot.
3. Select the USB FD who want to use and wait until the process is complete.
4. Done

Changelog:
- Fixed not run in 1 USB Boot generated telephone numbers.
- Fixed not run Norton Ghost on the desktop in Windows Mini.
- Updated to add LAN and WIFI Driver.
- Fixed 1 few boot menu
